name: Infinite Burger Simulator^2
description:
Have you ever wanted a mindless game? Have you ever wanted to eat burgers indefinitely? Do you want to simulate the daily life of an average American? Well, this game is for you!

(Note: This game will recieve some updates, so expect them!)

The original game: https://beethebee.itch.io/infinite-burger-simulator

My Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/NinjaScruffTuna/featured
